English: to enquire, according to custom, after the name and horoscope of intended bride

d.f: `古代~`婚嫁~`六禮~`中的~`第~`二禮~。`在~`納采~`之後~，`由~`男方~`派~`人~`到~`女家~`問~`新娘~`的~`姓名~`及~`生年~`月~`日~，`用來~`占卜~`吉凶~、`合八字~。

English: to enquire, according to custom, after the name and horoscope of intended bride
one of a set of six traditional marriage protocols (`六禮~|`六~礼), in which name as well as date and time of birth (for horoscope) are formally requested of the prospective bride's family
